title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.1 - Limitation of psychology treatment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.1 - Limitation of psychology treatment

State Regulations
A psychologist who is authorized to treat workers'
compensation claimants shall be limited, pursuant to law, to the diagnosis, evaluation and treatment of mental, nervous, emotional and behavioral disorders
and illnesses, and shall render such treatment only within the field of his or
her professional competence as recognized by his or her
profession. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
331.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
